desc.brif:
AED 4,000 (Valued at AED 5,400)

Reveal a confident, blemish-free complexion through a curated blend of science-backed treatments and holistic care.

What’s Included


  1. 1. Expert Skin Consultation :
    In-depth skin analysis with a medical aesthetician
    Full review of diet, lifestyle, hormone history & skincare regimen (bring your products)
    Custom acne treatment plan designed to suit your skin’s unique needs
  2. 2. In-Clinic Treatments (Tailored Based on Severity and Skin Type) :
    Up to 2 Chemical Peels (Salicylic or Customized Medical Peels),
    2 Acne Hydrafacials,
    2 LED Light Therapy Sessions (Blue Light),
    3 PRP Treatments,
    2 IV Drips (Detox or Skin Glow)

Add-On Options (Preferential Pricing for Package Clients):

- Medical Grade Skincare at 20% off

- Additional PRP or Peels at 15% off

- Hormonal panel testing or nutritionist session

Why This Works


This comprehensive program tackles acne at every level—surface, hormonal, bacterial, and lifestyle. Whether your acne is stress-induced, hormonal, or chronic, this package is designed to reset your skin, repair damage, and build long-term clarity and confidence.

Continue to Booking

AED 5,100 (Valued at AED 6,700)

Science-backed solutions to restore strength, volume, and vitality—one strand at a time.

What’s Included


  1. 1. Expert Consultation :
    Comprehensive consultation with our physician,
    Medical history review and hormonal/nutritional analysis,
    Personalized treatment plan tailored to the root cause (genetic, hormonal, stress-induced, or nutritional)
  2. 2. In-Clinic Treatment Protocol (Administered over 3–4 months) :
    3 PRP Hair Therapy Sessions,
    1 Growth Factor Application or Add-on Booster,
    2 Scalp Hydrafacial,
    2 Hairfall Defense IV Drips
  3. 3. At-Home Support :
    1 Month Supply of Medical-Grade Hair Supplements/ Serums

Bonus for Package Clients:

- 15% off additional PRP or IV sessions

- 20% off Exosomes

Why This Works


Our Hair Loss Package is more than a treatment—it’s a fully customized protocol to reboot scalp health, restore hair follicle function, and support long-term regrowth. Whether your concerns stem from postpartum shedding, androgenetic alopecia, or stress-related loss, this program is designed to meet you where you are and bring your hair back to life.

Continue to Booking

AED 6,500 (Valued at AED 8,900)

A targeted protocol to fade dark spots, even skin tone, and restore radiant clarity—designed for your skin’s unique pigmentation profile.

What’s Included


  1. 1. Expert Consultation & Skin Profiling :
    Personalized consultation with our skin specialist to evaluate pigmentation type (melasma, sun spots, age-related, or PIH),
    Full review of lifestyle and current skincare routine (clients are encouraged to bring their products),
    Customized treatment plan based on skin sensitivity, depth of pigmentation, and overall goals
  2. 2. Targeted In-Clinic Treatments (Scheduled over 6–10 weeks) :
    1 Cosmelan Peel,
    Up to 2 Skin Booster Treatments,
    1 PRP Session (Platelet-Rich Plasma),
    1 Medical Grade Retinol session (Brightening Cocktail),
    2 Signature Facial Treatment,
    1 IV Drip session
  3. 3. At-Home Support : 1 Month Supply of Medical-Grade Hair Supplements/ Serums

Bonus for Package Clients:

- 15% off additional Skin booster or IV sessions

- 20% off Exosomes

Why This Works


Pigmentation is complex—and we treat it as such. Our multi-step program addresses all layers of discoloration, from the surface to the deeper dermis, using a combination of chemical peels, regenerative therapies, skin boosters, and medical-grade skincare. Whether caused by sun exposure, hormonal shifts, or inflammation, this package is designed to deliver noticeable clarity, brightness, and lasting results.

Continue to Booking

AED 7,200 (Valued at AED 9,500)

A non-surgical, personalized body contouring journey to help you tone, sculpt, and reveal your best shape—backed by cutting-edge technology and wellness support.

What’s Included


  1. 1. Body Consultation & Wellness Assessment :
    One-on-one consultation with our expert aesthetic team,
    Full evaluation of target areas, lifestyle, and metabolic profile,
    Custom treatment plan based on your body goals (abdomen, arms, thighs, chin, etc.)
  2. 2. Body Contouring + Fat Reduction Treatments :
    2 Morpheus8® Sessions,
    5 LipoZero Session,
    2 Liposculpt Sessions (Fat melting injections)
  3. 3. Internal Support & Wellness Boosters :
    2 IV Drips (Detox + Metabolism Boost),
    1 Shot of L-Carnitine or B12 Booster (based on consultation)

Optional Add-Ons at Preferential Rates for Package Clients:

- IV NAD+ for cellular rejuvenation at 15% off

- Peptides at 10% off


Continue to Booking
